author: Sephiko

text: I have always loved this song, relaxing and with a nice retro style feeling
author: Underworld23

text: Xenosaga isn't technically a sequal to Xenogears for multiple reasons, but yeah, the first game had some good music in it though not very much by VG standards.   Ep. II had a few good tracks (my favorites being the Summer version of the SC Domain and Labyrinthos, as well as boss theme 1).  Ep. III, on the other hand, probaby has some of the best music in the series, and quite a bit of it to boot.
author: Kojou Akatsuki

text: lol I didn't even know Xenosaga had music in it - you know what's weird is that both Tenchu: Stealth Assassins and Xenogears have some of the best music I've ever heard in video games but then their sequals went with a direction of having very minmalistic, more minimalistic than usual in the music department as far as video games go, I bought the sequals to both blindly... that's when I stopped buying sequals blindly ^^
author: thetubeaccount

text: Ack!  No offense, but it's not my favorite tune for the Elsa.  At least not like the one in Ep. III.  Other than that, it's okay.
